scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains letters; postcards; Eastern Kentucky Oil Company production reports; bills and receipts; account statements; a speech from the centennial anniversary of General Robert E. Lee's birthday; a souvenir religious booklet from All Saints' Day in Paris, France; and an invitation to a reception hosted by the General John H. Morgan Monument Committee of Lexington, Kentucky, addressed to Mr. and Mrs. John Morgan. Several letters between John Hunt Morgan and George W. Reffeitt, a land surveyor, discuss Morgan's property in Menifee County, Kentucky, and exorbitant property taxes. Lilian Vaughan Morgan of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, wrote letters to her mother-in-law, Ellen Howard Morgan, discussing her young children with Thomas Hunt Morgan.
